title: Bug 113047 - No Children Node Listing When Changing Data Source for a Dataset in Dataset Editor Page of the Query Tab
OB: Upon changing the data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab, there is no children node listing.
SR:
Bug 113047 - No Children Node Listing When Changing Data Source for a Dataset in Dataset Editor Page of the Query Tab. 

Description: Upon changing the data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab, there is no children node listing. 
Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Create a new dataset without an SQL statement. 
2. In the dataset editor data source page, change the data source. 
3. The new data source has no database/table/column information. 
Actual Result: No children node listing when changing the data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab. Close the dataset editor and reopen it.
